survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on current sustainable office practices and identify areas for improvement to reduce environmental impact.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with your company's sustainability initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Consider adding a 'Not applicable' option if needed.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with your company's sustainability initiatives?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable practices does your office currently implement? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select options. Ensure 'None of the above' is mutually exclusive if selected.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable practices does your office currently implement? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What additional sustainable practices would you like to see implemented in your office?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length if necessary.

script.question_text: What additional sustainable practices would you like to see implemented in your office?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current recycling facilities in your office?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current recycling facilities in your office?

questions.question_text: Would you participate in a company-wide sustainability training program if offered?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to gauge interest in training programs.

script.question_text: Would you participate in a company-wide sustainability training program if offered?
